long.ar,bg,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,es,et,fi,fr,h:
♦︎Youskip - Youtube Ad Auto Skipper♦︎
Youtube Ad Auto Skipper, Ads mute & Speed Up Unskippable Ads

Say goodbye to interruptions and hello to uninterrupted viewing with Youskip, your go-to YouTube ad skipping extension. Designed to enhance your YouTube experience, Youskip automatically clicks the "Skip Ad" button, accelerates unskippable ads, and mutes the sound during ad playback. Enjoy your favorite videos the way they were meant to be seen - ad-free, fast, and with no unwanted noise.

♦︎Key Features♦︎

🔴Automatic Ad Skipping
Automatically clicks the "Skip Ad" button as soon as it appears, letting you continue watching without pause.

🔴Ad Acceleration for Unskippable Ads
Speeds up the playback of unskippable ads, saving you time and getting you back to your video faster.

🔴Sound Muting During Ads
Automatically mutes the sound of ads, providing a seamless and disturbance-free viewing experience.

🔴User-Friendly Interface
Easy to install and simple to use, AdSkip integrates seamlessly into your YouTube browsing without any complicated settings.

♦︎Why Choose Youskip?♦︎

👍Enhance Your Viewing Experience
Watch YouTube videos without any ad interruptions or loud, unwanted noise from ads.

👍Save Time
Don't let unskippable ads slow you down. Our ad acceleration feature ensures you spend more time watching what you love.

👍Seamless Integration
Youskip works quietly in the background, offering a smooth and improved YouTube experience without any effort on your part.

Ready to transform your YouTube watching experience? Download Youskip now and enjoy a cleaner, faster, and more enjoyable viewing journey on YouTube!

♦︎Update Notes♦︎
👍16.02.2024 
- Bug fixed

👍27.02.2024 
- Bug fixed
- Add new features

👍25.09.2024 
- Bug fixed
- Add New Ad blocker Rules for other ads
- Add Fastest feature for long ads
